member.name: T:ExpressionPowerTools.Serialization.Serializers.ExpressionSerializer
member.summary: Top-level serializer that passes work off to specific types.
member.remarks: The constructor for this class scans the assembly for serializers tagged with . These are loaded based on the they represent and stored as . The serializers should be accessed through the static class, which takes the serializable classes and serializes them to and from JSON.
